chapter.title: Setting Up a Simple Testing Resource

abstract.para: After your cluster is installed and set up as described in and you have learned how to configure resources either with the GUI or from command line, this chapter provides a basic example for the configuration of a simple resource: an IP address. It demonstrates both approaches to do so, using either the &hbgui; or the crm command line tool.
For the following example, we assume that your cluster consists of at least two nodes.
